chartSettings.plainMarkdownContent:
|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| ![Million Eyes](https://github.com/mzeier/millioneyes/blob/master/slo-trooper.png?raw=true) | This dashboard provides an overview of website response times as configured [here](https://github.com/lacework/ansible/blob/master/millioneyes.yml).

charts.name: CHECK(S) UP
charts.description: This chart shows number of Checks that are up.

charts.name: CHECK(S) DOWN
charts.description: Checks that were continuously down from past one hour.

charts.name: Avg Response Time
charts.description: Average response time (seconds) across all websites.

chartSettings.plainMarkdownContent:
**Performance Indicators**

*Total errors:*

* The top row counts, in a rolling window, the number of errors seen (or not 200s/300s).

*Errors by Website:*

* The middle row helps show which sides are having errors.

*% Success (99.99% SLI):*

* The bottom row is % healthy (total success / total checks).
